detail_desc: Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with lace embroidery. Deep V-neck with a wide flounced trim, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.

Off-the-shoulder, knee-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed elastication and a wide flounce at the top, covered buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y).

Short blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a wide neckline and pleats at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an open back with decorative gathers and ties. Unlined.

Short blouse in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a wide neckline and pleats at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and an open back with decorative gathers and ties. Unlined.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in airy crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a narrow elasticated seam, and a smocked hem. Unlined.
Short lace tube top made partly from recycled polyester with elastication at the top and narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck. Seam with wide elastication at the hem. Jersey lining.

Sleeveless playsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. V-neck front and back with inset crocheted trims, a concealed zip at the back, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and wide legs. Lined at the bottom.

Long dress in patterned, lightly crêped chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Double yoke with decorative gathers, a draped V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top, and short cap sleeves. Smocked waist and an asymmetric skirt with a flounced trim and jersey lining.
Short skirt in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. High waist, a concealed zip in one side and two flounced tiers to the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with a V-shaped opening and narrow ties at the top, and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Trousers in airy, crinkled chiffon made partly from recycled polyester with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and concealed pockets in the side seams. Low crotch and extra-wide, flared legs. Jersey lining at the top.
Long skirt in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a high waist, buttons at one side and a gathered seam at the hips. Unlined.
Long skirt in lace made partly from recycled polyester with several flounced tiers. High waist with wide elastication. Partly lined in jersey.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Short, wide shorts in a viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and side pockets.
Shorts in patterned cotton twill with a zip fly and button, coin pocket, side pockets and welt back pockets.
Shorts in patterned cotton twill with a zip fly and button, coin pocket, side pockets and welt back pockets.

Long, sleeveless dress in sturdy satin with a deep V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side, a seam at the waist and a flared, segmented skirt. Satin lining.
Long lace skirt with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The skirt is longer at the back creating a small train. Lined.
Short lace top with a round neckline and short sleeves. Covered buttons at the back and a scalloped trim around the sleeves and hem. Satin lining.

Long, off-the-shoulder dress with a lace bodice and tulle skirt. Sweetheart neckline front and back, a concealed zip and decorative, covered buttons down the back, support panels in the bodice and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam with grosgrain ribbon at the waist and a flared skirt in several layers of tulle and satin. Lined.
Long, V-neck dress in lace with short cap sleeves, a seam at the waist, concealed zip at the back and skirt with a gentle flare to the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket woven in a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow notch lapels, a single button at the front and buttons at the cuffs. Chest pocket, flap patch pockets and a double back vent. Lined.
Suit trousers woven in a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist, zip fly, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections down the sides. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband and ventilating mesh sections down the sides. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Fully lined swimsuit with crossover flounces at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Elastication at the top to make the swimsuit easy to put on and take off.
V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with scalloping at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
V-neck top in soft cotton jersey with scalloping at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, and an adjustable tab at the sides.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-style blouse in soft, double-layered cotton with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the top and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-style blouse in soft, double-layered cotton with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the top and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Tunic in a plumeti-weave modal blend with a round neckline with an opening and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, narrow cuffs with a button, and seams in the lower section.
Tunic in a plumeti-weave modal blend with a round neckline with an opening and ties at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, narrow cuffs with a button, and seams in the lower section.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.
Blouse in woven fabric with a stand-up collar with gathers at the front and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.

V-neck blouse woven in a crinkled cupro blend with a collar, wrapover top with a draped effect, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, a decorative knot detail at one side, and a lower section with an asymmetric cut at the front of the hem.
Pleated, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist.
Pleated, knee-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist.

Jacket in washed, stretch denim with sleeves and a detachable, jersey-lined hood in patterned sweatshirt fabric. Collar, press-studs down the front, fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud, and ribbed cuffs.
Skirt in patterned, washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and a flounce at the hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and embroidered appliqués on the knees.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (normal sequins in sizes 1½-3Y), a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak and neck protector. UPF 50.
Cap in UV-protective fabric with a peak and neck protector. UPF 50.

Short, straight-cut dress in a lightweight, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders, long, wide, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the hem with wide flounces. Unlined.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
A-line skirt in a patterned weave with a concealed zip in one side.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable, padded, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket, zipped front pockets, and inner ribbing and a tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Oversized T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Oversized T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Oversized T-shirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and low dropped shoulders.

Jacket in imitation leather with a detachable hood in a double layer of sweatshirt fabric. Small stand-up collar with a press-stud, a zip down the front, zipped front pockets, and quilted sections on the shoulders and sleeves. Lined.
